title: Writing Debug Info to Summary
text: When developing and debugging Manager scripts in APSIM Next Gen, itâ€™s helpful to write custom messages to the Summary window.

title: Writing Debug Info to Summary
text:
Purpose
To output internal script data, such as calculated variables, to the Summary window during simulation.

title: Writing Debug Info to Summary
Accessing FloweringDAS from a Manager Script
text: In APSIM Next Gen, developmental stages like flowering are managed within the plant model (e.g., Wheat). This feature demonstrates how to retrieve the number of days after sowing (DAS) to flowering using a Manager script.

title: Accessing FloweringDAS from a Manager Script
text:
Goal
To access the value of FloweringDAS during the simulation.

title: Accessing FloweringDAS from a Manager Script
text:
Prerequisites
Ensure your plant model (e.g., Wheat) has the Phenology module with a function or variable named FloweringDAS.

title: Accessing FloweringDAS from a Manager Script
text:
How It Works
We use an OnEventFunction to link to the Phenology.FloweringDAS path dynamically.

title: Accessing FloweringDAS from a Manager Script
